title: Start
text: You're standing on a sandy beach. The ocean stretches out before you, and a small village sits off in the distance. What do you do ?

title: Village
text: You enter the village and see that it is bustling with activity. People are going about their daily lives, and there are several shops and homes to explore. What do you do ?

title: Shop
text: You enter a shop and find a wide variety of items for sale. There are clothes, trinkets, and all sorts of other things. What do you buy ?

actions.text: Leave the shop without buying anything

text: You buy a hat and put it on. It's the perfect addition to your beach outfit.
You buy a souvenir to remember your trip to the beach. You can't wait to show it off to your friends back home.

title: Villager
text: You strike up a conversation with a friendly villager. They tell you about the history of the village and the nearby attractions. You thank them for their time and continue on your way.

title: Ocean
text: You dive into the ocean and swim out into the crystal-clear water. The waves are gentle, and the water is cool and refreshing. You spend hours swimming and enjoying the beautiful scenery.

title: Beach
text: You explore the beach and find all sorts of interesting things. You see shells, crabs, and even a piece of driftwood that you decide to take home as a souvenir. You spend the day enjoying the sun and the sand.
